sense.gloss: remote place, backcountry, the sticks, hinterland
to have a warped view, to be jaundiced, to be prejudiced
to feel that one has been unfairly treated
to be jealous, to be envious, to have an inferiority complex
being off to one side, being away off in the country

sdata.j: サラリーマンが↑罪↑↓つみ↓ほろぼしに↑僻地↑↓へきち↓でひっそりと↑暮↑↓く↓らしはじめた。
sdata.e: The salaryman went to live quietly in a remote area in order to atone for his sins.

sdata.j: 「かわいければ、↑何↑↓なに↓してもいいとか、そういう↑考↑↓かんが↓えやめた↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいよ」「それって、↑僻↑↓ひが↓み？」
sdata.e: You should stop thinking you can do whatever you want just because you're cute. "I think somebody's jealous!"

words.gloss: remote place, backcountry, the sticks, hinterland
to have a warped view, to be jaundiced, to be prejudiced
